column1: Screen reader users: There is 1 table on this tab called Table 25: Deceased-donor kidney transplants* by province of treatment, adult recipients, Canada (excluding Quebec), 2012 to 2021 (number). Table 25  Deceased-donor kidney transplants* by province of treatment, adult recipients, Canada (excluding Quebec), 2012 to 2021 (number)
